description: My e-commerce platform - started as a learning project, evolved into something useful

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install-all && echo 'Setup complete! Run npm run dev to start development servers.'
scripts.deploy:render: echo 'Deploy to Render using render.yaml configuration'
scripts.env:setup: echo 'Creating environment files...' && echo 'JWT_SECRET=your_super_secure_jwt_secret_key_2024' > backend/.env && echo 'PORT=3000' >> backend/.env && echo 'NODE_ENV=development' >> backend/.env && echo 'VITE_API_URL=http://localhost:3000/api' > frontend/.env.local && echo 'Environment files created!'
scripts.env:production: echo 'Production environment variables needed:' && echo 'Backend (Render): NODE_ENV=production, JWT_SECRET=<strong_secret>, PORT=10000' && echo 'Frontend (Vercel): VITE_API_URL=https://your-backend-url.onrender.com/api'
scripts.predeploy: npm run test && npm run build
scripts.postdeploy: echo 'Deployment complete! Check your deployment URLs.'
